name: 33rd Street
description:
You play as a low-income dad, trying to make it through another Christmas with your family. Your kids don't expect anything for Christmas this year, money is tight, your job is on the line, and rent is due.

But maybe this year will be different.

Maybe this year you'll attend your son's school Christmas play and get your daughter that dream dollhouse she's always wanted.

33rd Street was originally created for the Holiday Game Jam.
